channel.title: Readline on warrick.io
channel.description: Recent content in Readline on warrick.io

item.title: Readline Shortcuts
item.description: CTRL + w delete previous word CTRL + e jump to end of line CTRL + a jump to the beginning of line CTRL + u delete entire line before cursor CTRL + k delete entire line after cursor CTRL + y restore previously deleted word,line,etc. CTRL + l clear the screen http://cnswww.cns.cwru.edu/php/chet/readline/rltop.html
